CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( AND ( ( Owner.LastName = "Hall"),IsWon = True, Date_Created__c < Date(2018,01,01), CloseDate > Date(2017,12,31), CloseDate <Date (2018,02,01)), AND ( (Owner.LastName = "Saracene"), IsWon = True,Date_Created__c < Date(2018,01,01), CloseDate > Date(2017,12,31), CloseDate <Date (2018,02,01)), AND ( ( Owner.LastName = "Hogervorst"),IsWon = True, Date_Created__c < Date(2018,01,01), CloseDate > Date(2017,12,31), CloseDate <Date (2018,02,01)), AND ( ( Owner.LastName = "Brown"),IsWon = True, Date_Created__c < Date(2018,01,01), CloseDate > Date(2017,12,31), CloseDate <Date (2018,02,01))),( (Amount / 2) - Amount),0)
CustomField.label: Jan 50/50 Retirement
